lead_paragraph: The Providence Journal, in a letter from the Mexican Boundary Commission, gives the following sketch of Gen. CARRASCO, who has lately established a military colony on the outskirts of the State of Sonora, and in the heart of the Apache Indians: "We found Gen. Carrasco In the town when we arrived, on his way to Janos, He is a man of rather small stature, but of great intellligence and energy.
abstract: Boundary Commission - adventures with the Indians
